template.name: Template App WSUS 3.0
template.description:
Template for Microsoft WSUS Server zbx.sadman@gmail.com
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/wsus_miner
Requirements: WSUS 3.0 and above, PowerShell 2.0 and above

item.name: Current synchronization process status
item.description:
Canceled The synchronization process has been canceled.
Failed The synchronization process has failed.
NeverRun The synchronization process has never run.
Succeeded The synchronization process has successfully completed.
Unknown The synchronization process has ended for an unknown reason.

item.name: Last synchronization process status
item.description:
Canceled The synchronization process has been canceled.
Failed The synchronization process has failed.
NeverRun The synchronization process has never run.
Succeeded The synchronization process has successfully completed.
Unknown The synchronization process has ended for an unknown reason.

item.name: Number of "Approved" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that have not been approved or declined.

item.name: Number of "ClientErrors" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that have at least one client that is currently in a failed state for that update.

item.name: Number of "Declined" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that have been declined by an administrator.

item.name: Number of "Expired" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server whose latest revision is marked as expired by the publisher of the update

item.name: Number of "Installed" or "NotApplicable" updates for all computers
item.description: Number of Updates on the WSUS that are known to be Installed or NotApplicable on all computers.

item.name: Number of "NeedingFiles" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that do not have all the required installation files.

item.name: Number of "NotApproved" critical or security updates
item.description: Number of critical or security updates on the WSUS server that are not approved for installation.

item.name: Number of "NotApproved" or "Declined" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that have not been approved or declined

item.name: Number of "ServerErrors" updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that are in a failure state

item.name: Number of administrator-created computer target groups
item.description: Number of administrator-created computer target groups on the WSUS server.

item.name: Number of clients updated with fails
item.description: Number of clients with at least one update that is currently in a failure state.

item.name: Number of days from last synchronization
Number of full updated clients
item.description: Number of clients on which all Updates are known to be Installed or NotApplicable.

item.name: Number of known clients
item.description: Number of clients that are known to the WSUS server.

item.name: Number of outdated updates
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that have a revision of an update that is approved but is not the latest revision

item.name: Number of partially updated clients
item.description: Number of clients with at least one update that is not yet installed.

item.name: Number of updates that are needed by one or more client computers
item.description: Number of updates on the WSUS server that are needed by one or more client computers.

item.name: Number of WSUS infrastructure updates that are not approved for installation
item.description: Number of WSUS infrastructure updates on the WSUS server that are not approved for installation

item.name: Total number of updates
item.description: Total number of updates on the WSUS server.

item_prototype.name: [{#NAME}] Number of clients updated with fails
[{#NAME}] Number of clients with unknown update status

trigger.name: A number of clients need updates ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1})
Clients with update errors is detected ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1})
Not approved critical or security updates is detected ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1})
Not approved WSUS Infrastructure updates is detected ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1})
Updates with installation errors is detected ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1})
Version of WSUS Server was changed on {HOST.NAME}
WSUS Server last synchronization is not succeeded
WSUS Server synchronization is not held for more than {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} days
